EmailTemplate.subject: JetWave™ SATCOM – Buy the Best for Less!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Fly with the best Wi-Fi in the sky and save money, too. For a limited time, Honeywell is offering special pricing on the JetWave™ satellite communications system for business aircraft. All you have to do is contact our JetWave sales team and arrange to have your system installed by Dec. 31, 2019, and you’re eligible for our very best price on the very best SATCOM in the sky. Don’t be concerned about downtime, because it only takes about two weeks for one of our authorized JetWave channel partners to get you ready to roll. And it’s easy to schedule installation around your next scheduled service interval. You probably know JetWave <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/jetwave-business-aviation]]> by reputation. It’s the satellite communications system everyone’s talking about because it gives your passengers the kind of connected experience they’re used to getting on the ground, anywhere you fly. With JetWave, you can send and receive email, surf the web, download and upload huge files, stream live video and so much more. All with speed, reliability and global availability that will make you forget you’re flying. There’s never been a better time to say goodbye to your obsolete SATCOM system and move on up to JetWave. Contact us today to learn more.
GET CONNECTED <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/Setting-New-Standards-for-In-Flight-Connectivity?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_godirectcabin_bga&utm_content=marketo]]>
